name: com.lingotion.thespeon
description: This is the Lingotion Thespeon package. To get started, please see Window > Lingotion > Lingotion Thespeon Info.

_upm.changelog:
# [0.2.2] - 2025-05-02
## Added
* Added delete buttons for imported packs.
## Changed
* It is now possible to queue synthesize tasks - if a synthetization is underway, any subsequent calls to Synthesize will wait until it is done.
* User will now be notified properly if an incompatible pack is imported.
## Fixed
* Fixed numerous issues related to audio quality

samples.description: A demo GUI that showcases the flexibility of Thespeon.
A script showing the simplest way to get started with Thespeon.
